databaseModule

Class QueryFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseModule.MongoManager
      • databaseModule.QueryFunctions

  • public class QueryFunctions
extends MongoManager
    Pulls queried data from MongoDB and compares key values.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    ActianceEngInterns

    • Method Detail

      • getTables

        public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>> getTables()
        Getter method for table.
        Returns:
        a 2D representation of CSV as a series of tables, with each table representing a single comparison

      • getDiscrepancies

        public java.lang.Integer[] getDiscrepancies()
        Getter method for the discrepancy statistics of a query.
        Returns:
        the discrepancy statistics as an Integer[] where Integer[0] is the total number of differences in the keys of a query and Integer[1] is the total number of differences in the values of a query

      • generateInternalQueries

        public java.lang.String generateInternalQueries(java.lang.String path)
        Takes in a single path input and generates a series of queries between the subdirectories of the specified path.
        example path parameters:
        dev1/fabric2
        example queries:
        dev1/fabric2/node1
        dev1/fabric2/node2
        dev1/fabric2/node1
        dev1/fabric2/node3
        dev1/fabric2/node2
        dev1/fabric2/node3
        Parameters:
        path - the path containing the subdirectories being compared against each other
        Returns:
        a String representing the status of the query: null if successful, else error message

      • addQuery

        public java.lang.String addQuery(java.lang.String pathL,
                                 java.lang.String pathR)
        Adds path inputs to the internal queryPairs List.
        Parameters:
        pathL - the first path being compared
        pathR - the other path being compared
        Returns:
        a String containing any filters throwing exceptions (empty if none)

      • generateFilter

        private static org.bson.Document generateFilter(java.lang.String path)
        Private helper method. Given path inputs, verifies the validity of the inputs and generates filters for the inputs.
        example path parameters:
        dev1/fabric2
        example filter:
        {environment: "dev1", fabric: "fabric2"}
        Parameters:
        path - the path for which a filter is being generated
        Returns:
        the generated filter as a BSON Document

      • exclude

        public void exclude(java.lang.String path)
        Excludes queried files with certain attributes from being compared.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file being blocked

      • clearQuery

        public void clearQuery()
        Clears the internal queryPairs and excludedProps Lists.

      • compare

        public boolean compare()
        Retrieves filtered files from the MongoDB database, excludes files as appropriate, compares the remaining queried files, and adds the results to a CSV file.
        Returns:
        true if query is valid, false if not

      • createTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> createTable(java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> propsL,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> propsR)
        Compares Documents and adds the comparison outcomes to the table.
        Parameters:
        propsL - a List of Documents representing every property in the left side of the query
        propsR - a List of Documents representing every property in the right side of the query
        Returns:
        the table as an ArrayList of String[] containing the entirety of a comparison between queries, with each String[] representing a CSV row

      • writeToCSV

        public void writeToCSV(java.lang.String filename,
                       java.lang.String directory)
        Writes stored data to a CSV file with a user-specified name and directory.
        Parameters:
        filename - the user-specified filename
        directory - the user-specified directory

      • writeToCSV

        public void writeToCSV(java.lang.String directory)
        Writes data to CSV file with a default name if the name is not user-specified.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory the CSV is being written to

      • getDefaultName

        public java.lang.String getDefaultName()
        Creates a default name for the CSV file based on the lowest-level metadata provided in the query.
        Returns:
        the default CSV name

      • findProp

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findProp(java.lang.String input,
                                                             java.lang.String location,
                                                             int type)
        Queries the database for a user-given key and returns location(s) and values(s) of the key.
        Parameters:
        input - the key or value being found
        location - a specific path within which to find the key
        type - 0 for key, 1 for value
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing each key location and value

      • grep

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> grep(java.lang.String pattern,
                                                   int type)
        Finds every key or value in the database that contains a user-given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - substring being searched for
        type - 0 for key, 1 for value
        Returns:
        a Set of property keys or values that contain the pattern
